subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre, Michael Strahan and Warren Sapp have retired, costing the N.F.L. three potential first-ballot Hall of Famers with extra-large-sized personalities.
snippet: Brett Favre, Michael Strahan and Warren Sapp have retired, costing the N.F.L. three potential first-ballot Hall of Famers with extra-large-sized personalities.
